# 🛍️ SuperMall Web Application

A simple Firebase + Firestore powered web app for managing shops, offers, and users (Admin / Merchant / Customer).  
Built using **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript** only — no backend required.

---

## 🚀 Features
- User Registration & Login (using Firestore)
- Role-based redirects (Admin / Merchant / Customer)
- Manage shops and offers
- Ready-to-run local setup with Firebase
- Includes test data for immediate demo
